message:
Shibir calls for nation-wide demonstration on Monday


Shibir announced a nation-wide protest on Monday condemning the arrest of their literary secretary Yasin Arafat and human resources secretary Sadrul Islam.
A press released signed by Shibir central Science and technology secretary Mohammad Sirajul Islam  is sent to the media on Sunday evening.
Rapid Action Battalion (RAB) arrested three Islami Chhatra Shibir men, including the two central leaders from Gopibag in the capital at Saturday midnight. Police found huge leaflets during the arrest.
Shibir in their written statement has condemned the arrest of their leader in the darkness of night.
"This givernment does not believe in democracy, difference of opinions, rule of law and political efficacy", the statement said. 
Mentioning the custodial torture of their central president the statement warned further movements if the central president is not provided with proper medical treatment and detained leaders are not released.
